name: Jiangsu Jiangshan Chemical Co., Ltd.
description: Jiangsu Jiangshan Chemical Co., Ltd. is a leading manufacturer and supplier of a diverse range of chemical products, specializing in the production of fine chemicals, agrochemicals, and pharmaceutical intermediates. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Jiangsu Province, China, the company has established a strong reputation for its commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability. Jiangshan Chemical operates advanced manufacturing facilities equipped with state-of-the-art technology that enables the production of high-purity chemicals while adhering to strict environmental standards. The company's product portfolio includes a variety of specialty chemicals utilized in agriculture, pharmaceuticals, and industry, catering to both domestic and international markets. Jiangshan Chemical is dedicated to research and development, continually striving to enhance its product offerings and develop new solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers. With a focus on sustainable practices, the company is committed to reducing its environmental footprint and contributing to a greener future. Jiangsu Jiangshan Chemical Co., Ltd. aims to expand its global presence and strengthen its position as a key player in the chemical industry.
